coded_answer.p: ItI was grateful for your message. I can gladly give you some information which you need.

I would be able to travel only in July because I have a job at the moment, but it will be my vacation in July. I would prefer to be in tents, so that I couldcan enjoy a naturenatural life more than being in log cabins. Moreover, it would be more exciting for me.

It could be nice for doingto do two activities while I am at the Camp. I am interested in sports. EspeciallyIn particular, I am wonderfulbrilliant at swimming. I have swimmedswum since I was in primary school. I would like to learn playingto play golf at the Camp. I have never played golf in my life. Is it possible to learn playingto play golf, although I am not good at golf?
Would you mind giving some answeranswers about whether I need some clothes and money at the Camp?
I look forward to hearing from you.
I'm sorry that I haven't written to you for a long time. It was nice you wanted to hear about my experience, and I know you're looking for a job which I did.

It was a wonderful chanceopportunity for me. As you know, I love music. Before the concert started, I cleaned the stage for the singers and I gave some drinks to the singers. Finally, I cleaned the stage again. My workswork werewas for the singers, so I could meet singers and talk togetherwith them.
Do you know "Radio Head"? It is my favourite group. I was able to have some signaturesautographs offrom them. It's brilliant, isn't it?
EspeciallyIn particular, I liked cleaning the stage, because I could stand on a famousefamous singer's stage and I could feel his enthusiasm, even though I had to clean it.
I want to hear about your school life, and your part-time job.
I'm looking forward to hearing from you.
